result.execSummary:
The defendant Sonya M Daniels was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Substantial Battery-Intend Bodily Harm, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Shawano County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Outstanding financial obligations are not a condition of probation & are to be paid directly to the Shawano Co Clerk of Court office within 30 days.  Debts older than 60 days will be processed for tax intercept & civil judgments.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  Payment plans available for qualifying amounts.
All financials same as noted above.  All financials same as noted above.

Huber / work release granted for any purpose the Law allows.  
Can transfer to Forest County. - 2-10-17 per jail should have credit from 4-29-16 to 5-5-16
Consecutive to: to any other case.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.descr: Notice and acknowledge of def voting ineligibility

records.addlTxt: to DE of Penalties
DNA proof of submission-signed by DE

Defendant Sonya M Daniels in court with attorney Ronald Duane Haacke.  Catharine Denise White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PLQ filed w/NC plea.   ADA White makes recommendation of jail, fine/costs and transportation fees.  Court reviews rights, charges & penalties w/DE.  Court accepts waiver, plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty.  ADA White cites DE's history.  Atty Haacke argues, 4 months jail.  DE addresses the Court.  Court follows recommendation of the State, 6 months jail consecutive to any other sentence, $500 fine plus costs, DNA sample and surcharge, transportation costs.   ADA White reqeusts to address issue of report date - high risk, long history of non appearance at court.  Atty Haacke - client need to make arraignments for children.  Court questions DE.  DE to be taken into custody immediately.  Credit for time served.  Appeal & voting rights given to DE.  2:55 PM -Atty Haacke - DE requests transfer to Forest Co. and Huber for Child Care.  Court questions DE , will grant transfer and Huber under Forest Co. rules.
Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing on January 9, 2017 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Ronald Duane Haacke in court.  Catharine Denise White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  6th time defendant has failed to appear for court.  $10,000 cash warrant requested.  So authorized.  Commence forfeiture of previous bond.
Plea/sentencing hearing on December 9, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Sonya M Daniels in court with attorney Ronald Duane Haacke.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court addresses Attny Siehr's request for bond applying on attorney fees.  As bond was posted by another party, permission would be required.   This matter needs to be set with Branch #2 for further proceedings.  Defendant needs to sign her cash bond.

Defendant Sonya M Daniels not in court.  Gregory A. Parker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Received calls from mother & sister stating DE in Oneida Co. Jail on new charges.  ADA White requests $5000 warrant.  Court so orders.
Changing mind about return of bond money by Allison R.

Defendant Sonya M Daniels in court, in custody.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant still wants counsel.  Bond posted in this case however person wants money returned.  So ordered by the Court.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 23, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant Sonya M Daniels appeared by video means. Prosecuting Atty Catharine Denise White appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Arraignment scheduled for May 9, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant Sonya M Daniels not in court.  Court calls case at 2:15pm defendant was given notice.  Signature bond of $1500 will be forfeited.
failed to appear
to withdraw as counsel

Attorney Gabriel G. Siehr in court.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant has failed to appear.  Attny Sierh requests to withdraw as counsel as there has been no communications with the defendant since his last appearance.  Court signs order.  DA indicates this is the 5th non-appearance on this case alone.  $2,000.00 cash warrant authorized.  Commence forfeiture of the signature bond.  Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing scheduled for April 15, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Notice and Motion to Withdraw from Gabriel Siehr.
Subpoenas for 1/21/2016 - Preliminary Hearing
PTC - March 15, 2016 @2:30 PM

Defendant Sonya M Daniels in court with attorney Gabriel G. Siehr.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Dep. BS sworn & testifies.  DE stipulates she is person named in complaint.  Cross-exam. Closing argmument, Atty Siehr waives argument. Court finds probable cause and binds the matter over for trial.  ARRAIGNMENT - ADA White- Information will mirror complaint.  Atty Siehr enters NG plea on behalf of client.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 15, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
Gabriel Siehr
Preliminary hearing at 01-21-2016 03:00 pm

Defendant Sonya M Daniels in court with attorney Gabriel G. Siehr.  Gregory A. Parker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense requests warrant to be vacated.  Court reinstates the bond.  Defense requests a preliminary hearing and waives the time limits.  Bond continues.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for January 21, 2016 at 03:00 pm.

Attorney Gabriel G. Siehr in court.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attny Gabriel Siehr appears and advises the Court why defendant is not present.  Defendant had also contacted the Judge's office.  $1500 cash warrant authorized but is stayed until next Monday at 1:30 p.m.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 2, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Sonya M Daniels in court.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Indicates she will retain Gabriel Siehr.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 26, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Sonya M Daniels in court.  Catharine Denise White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Warrant authorized $1,500 cash as defendant fails to appear.  However, did call and indicate she had a flat tire.  Court will hold signing warrant until 1 p.m. tomorrow.   3:05 p.m. defendant appears.  Warrant vacated and bond reinstated.  Court advises defendant to get counsel by next court date or have a plan.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 19, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Sonya M Daniels not in court.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant called Branch #2 who adjourned this matter until 10/12/15.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 12, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Sonya M Daniels in court.  Scott E. Niemi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant has an appointment with Attny Cirilli on 9/24/15.  Is requesting the no contact with T.P. be waived.  Court explains process for waiver.  Victim witness will contact T.P. and explain.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 5, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Pictures & prints.
Absolute sobriety.

Defendant Sonya M Daniels in court.  Catharine Denise White appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Right to counsel given - defendant wishes to speak with an attorney.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 21, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
